title: Customized Science Teaching Strategies to Strengthen Cognitive Processes in International Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in secondary science education, understanding of basic learning style models
context.additional_context: Formative assessment-centered operation in a BYOD environment, enhancing science subject expertise for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose their cognitive style profiles when solving science problems in international contexts.
Learners can design blended group formation strategies with over 80% accuracy by analyzing differences in peer teachers' learning styles.
Learners can apply at least three instructional techniques to promote critical thinking in mobile-based microlearning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
